SAMPLE_CODE1 = """
CONSTANT = 1

class B(object):
    def foo(self):
        return CONSTANT
"""
SAMPLE_CODE2 = """
CONSTANT = 2

class B(object):
    def foo(self):
        return CONSTANT
"""
self.make_mod(sample=SAMPLE_CODE1)
import x
foo = x.B().foo
self.assertEqual(foo(), 1)
self.make_mod(sample=SAMPLE_CODE2)
pydevd_reload.xreload(x)
self.assertEqual(foo(), 1)
